content: Hi, what's the difference between this app and the FREE version? I've been a fan since this game used to belong to another developer on Google Play, but their customer service was horribly useless when I got a new phone and I lost the purchases of the other mansions. Never got refunded! All the emailing back and forth with them really traumatized me, but I was willing to pay for it again when I saw it relaunched here under a new developer. Now I can't help but wonder about the free version...?
replyContent: Hi, the free version is basically same but with ads in many places. The paid version didn't sell much on Google Play, so we launched the free version to get to more audiences. However, we'd much rather recommend the paid version for optimal experience.

content: I absolutely love the concept of this app, BUT I do not get your HINT SYSTEM it just makes no sense to me. I've studied the app for hours and just don't understand. Similar to Room and DaVinci apps. Loved those. Please explain the hint system for one more star.
replyContent: Hi. There's optimal solution in each puzzle. The hint system basically solves the puzzle in optimal solution path by a few steps from the beginning. We'll see how to make it more intuitive. Thank you for your feedback!

content: Purchased this game some years ago when it was The Mansion, but had to uninstall it when the developer scrapped the game. I'm ECSTATIC to have found it again! THANK YOU FOR REVIVING THIS GAME! ü•∞ Purchased it immediately & have been playing non-stop since the COVID-19 lockdown. This game is a truly unique puzzle game of moving rooms & other obstacles. It has quality graphics, great background music/sounds, & a curious plot with a cute young heroine.
replyContent: Thank you very mich for your review! I really appreciate you for remembering Rooms and playing again.

content: Good puzzle game! However, achievements don't "stick" for me. I'll get them and then they'll disappear again. Continue playing will make most of them unachievable, so I'm inclined to stop until this is fixed. Edit: took about 7 months but it's finally working, thanks! üëç
replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback! I'm checking that issue and will patch asap! We just uploaded a patch that fixed the achievements issue. The issue was that most achievements were not unlocked in the first place. Could you check again?
------
Thanks! Sorry for taking it so long to fix this.

content: Really enjoying game play, however I'm finding that even as I'm given XP and achievements the game doesn't log them. Still says i've unlocked zero achievements even though I've completed the entire first two Mansions including the basement levels with three puzzle pieces in every single room and I am halfway through the third with 3 puzzle pieces per room as well.- in trying to fix the problem I've lost the progress I've made. Super frustrating- probably going to delete this game. Too bad.
replyContent: Now the achievement is working. Also, we've added auto-cloud save feature.

content: Challenging but extremely fun.

content: Game was good but need to fix the hints because they move you back instead of forward from where you are.
replyContent:
Hello Rosalind, 
The hint indeed rolls back the progress from the beginning and progresses 3 steps. The more hint you use, the more steps it progresses, making the puzzle easier to solve. 
Although this is common way of doing hint, I see your point that it may feel like moving you back. We'll consider what we can do for it. Thanks for the feedback.
